sect1.title: MasterSlave function
sect1.para: This module extends the master-slave module with additional functionality. In order to use it the "MasterSlave::AdvancedEnabled" SysConfig option must be activated. Without this setting enabled, the module will behave as the limited MasterSlave module.

Next functionalities are available due to the advanced feature: - Master status / remove multiple tickets - Slave status / remove multiple tickets - Tickets set on the Master status - Tickets set in the Slave status - Ticket Master/ change multiple Slave tickets
Additional setings are available for the advanced module, they can founded on the "Configuration" for this module.

sect1.title: Replace customer's from Master ticket
sect1.para: The sysconfig option 'ReplaceCustomerRealNameOnSlaveArticleTypes' enables the posibility to replace the customer's real name from a Master ticket with the one for the current Slave ticket into the articles added to a Slave ticket due the MasterSlave feature.
For do it possible just enable the posible ArticleTypes on the mentioned sysconfig setting.

chapter.title: Configuration
chapter.para: The package can be configured via the SysConfig in the Admin Interface. The following configuration options are available:

section.title: MasterSlave::DynamicField.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
Define dynamic field name for master ticket feature.

section.title: MasterSlave::AdvancedEnabled.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
Enable the advanced MasterSlave part of the feature.

section.title: MasterSlave::UnsetMasterSlave.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
Enable the feature to unset the MasterSlave state of a ticket in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

section.title: MasterSlave::UpdateMasterSlave.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
Enable the feature to change the MasterSlave state of a ticket in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

section.title: MasterSlave::FollowUpdatedMaster.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
Enable the feature that slave tickets follow the master ticket to a new master in the advanced MasterSlave mode.

section.title: Ticket::EventModulePost###MasterSlave.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
Registration of the ticket event module.

section.title: PreApplicationModule###AgentMasterSlaveTicketPrepare.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: MasterSlave.
This module is preparing master/slave pulldown in email and phone ticket.

section.title: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketMasterSlave.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::ModuleRegistration.
Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###480-MasterSlave.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::MenuModule.
Shows a link in the menu to change the MasterSlave status of a ticket in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Permission.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.
Required permissions to use the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###RequiredLock.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.

Defines if a ticket lock is required in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###TicketType.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.
Sets the ticket type in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Service.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.
Sets the service in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Owner.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.
Sets the ticket owner in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###OwnerMandatory.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Responsible.

Sets the responsible agent of the ticket in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###State.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###StateType.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###StateDefault.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Subject.

Sets the default subject for notes added in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Body.

section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Priority.

Shows the ticket priority options in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###PriorityDefault.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.
Defines the default ticket priority in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

section.title: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketMasterSlave###Title.
section.para: Group: Ticket, Subgroup: Frontend::Agent::Ticket::ViewMasterSlave.
Shows the title fields in the ticket MasterSlave screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.
